base_description: Rectangular gray cabinet with a modern style.
part_description: Two doors at the bottom, one drawer on top, rectangular shape, positioned symmetrically.
internal_interaction_description: The drawer slides horizontally within the top section, while the doors swing open on hinges, revealing internal storage space. The parts are integrated to provide organized storage, with the drawer above the cabinet section for easy access.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against walls in kitchens or bathrooms, providing storage for items. It interacts with users through handles for opening and closing, and its surface can support small objects or decorations.
